description: Coordination sequence for CaF2(2), F position.
references: Gmelin Handbook of Inorg. and Organomet. Chem., 8th Ed., 1994, TYPIX search code (225) cF12
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000

Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,3,0,-3,0,1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[-(x^6 + 4 x^5 + 19 x^4 + 12 x^3 + 19 x^2 + 4 x + 1)/((x - 1)^3 (x + 1)^3), {x, 0, 50}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 15 2013 *)
author: R. W. Grosse-Kunstleve (rwgk(AT)cci.lbl.gov)
